member.name: D2D1_CUSTOM_VERTEX_BUFFER_PROPERTIES
member.summary: Defines a vertex shader and the input element description to define the input layout. The combination is used to allow a custom vertex effect to create a custom vertex shader and pass it a custom layout.

member.name: D2D1_CUSTOM_VERTEX_BUFFER_PROPERTIES.inputElements
member.summary: An array of input assembler stage data types.

member.name: D2D1_CUSTOM_VERTEX_BUFFER_PROPERTIES.elementCount
member.summary: The number of input elements in the vertex shader.
